DOC.brief_summary: The objective study evaluate impact AFS TVT procedures quality-of-life incontinent woman .
DOC.brief_title: Quality-of-Life Outcomes After Autologous Fascial Sling TVT : Prospective Randomized Trial
DOC.detailed_description: Between January 2001 March 2002 , 41 woman principal complaint stress urinary incontinence study prospective trial . Based result numerical variable ( include patient 's perception improvement satisfaction treatment ) , statistical test demonstrate need equal size group comparison . So , total size sample group previously establish least 40 woman . These patient randomly distribute , single-blind study , two group . Group G1 ( n=21 ) submit AFS Group G2 ( n=20 ) TVT implant . Average age G1 49 year ( range 26-69 ) , G2 , 52 year ( range 26-79 ) . This study approve Bioethics Commission School Medicine - UNESP , Botucatu . All woman underwent preoperative urodynamic study , use Dynograph R.611 recorder , confirm stress urinary incontinence . Patients involuntary detrusor contraction preexist bladder outlet obstruction ( BOO ) urodynamic study exclude study . The clinical follow subjective success rate perform 1 , 6 , 12 month annually hospital discharge . A questionnaire use obtain personal data , obstetric , gynecologic , family history , subjective analysis urine loss . Cure define complete dryness usage pad . De novo urgency consider patient problem urgency symptom preoperatively present complaint surgery persist 1 month . These symptom base clinical evaluation . Long-term patient ' satisfaction impact QoL perform 36 month surgery . To evaluate QoL validated questionnaire ( 11 ) ( King 's Health Questionnaire ) use . Follow range 36 54 month ( median : 44 month ) . Body mass index ( BMI ) calculate classified accord Garrow . All patient underwent physical examination include stress test . The degree pelvic organ prolapse assess grade accord Baden et al . Basal laboratory investigation ( serum creatinine , complete blood count , chemical microscopic urinalysis , urine culture ) routinely perform . In exceptional case ( lithiasis history , urinary infection ) renal ultrasound plain x-ray kidney , ureter bladder carry . In immediate postoperative , endovenous tramadol ( 10 mg/mL-1 ) use patient control analgesia ( PCA ) pump . After i.v . load dose 0.07 mL/Kg-1 ( administered period 30 min ) . The Physiotherapy Service surgical procedure responsible carry random assignment patient accordance casualty .
DOC.criteria: Stress Urinary Incontinence Detrusor obstruction hyperactivity
